title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items move below the label.
OB: The close button in the Navigator view moves down below the label when the view is resized smaller on linux, running build 20011127.
EB: The close button in the Navigator view should stay aligned with the label when the view is resized smaller on linux, running build 20011127.
SR:
1. Launch the application on linux with build 20011127.
2. Open the Navigator view.
3. Resize the Navigator view to be smaller.
4. Observe the position of the close button in the view.
